titles.title: Let There Be Glory And Honor And Praises

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let there be glory and honor and praises.
Glory and honor to Jesus.
Glory! Honor! Glory and honor to Him.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who is God, if not the Lord?
Who is a Rock, if not our King?
A fortress and a shield,
A tower of deliverance is He,
To all who trust in Him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who is God, if not the Lord?
Who is a Rock, if not our King?
He teaches me to war,
He aids me in the battle more and more,
Praise to His name forevermore.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sea la gloria, la honra y poder, gloria y honra a Cristo.
Gloria! Honra! Gloria y honra a el. (Repetir.)
